sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162040 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_N101Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.SECU_NO = AA.LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162040 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속년도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,DAT_CD ,LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO /* 계좌번호_증권번호 */ ,TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD /* 국세청자료구분코드 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL /* 장기집합투자증권저축소득공제구분코드 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD /* 장기집합투자증권저축금융기관코드 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP /* 장기집합투자증권저축회사명 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT /* 장기집합투자증권저축납입금액 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT /* 장기집합투자증권저축세액공제금액 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_DDCT_AMT ,CTR_TERM_MM_CNT ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , AC03.DAT_CD , AC03.SECU_NO ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , AC03.LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL , AC03.COM_CD , AC03.TRADE_NM , AC03.LONG_ASS_SUM , 0 , AC03.DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , AC03.CTR_TERM_MM_CNT , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , 'Y0040110' AS LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL , AA.SECU_NO /* 장기집합투자_계좌번호 */ ,AA.RESID /* 장기집합투자_주민등록번호 */ ,AA.NAME /* 장기집합투자_성명 */ ,AA.DAT_CD /* 자료코드 */ ,AA.BUSNID /* 장기집합투자_사업자등록번호 */ ,AA.TRADE_NM /* 장기집합투자_취급기관명 */ ,AA.FUND_NM /* 장기집합투자_펀드명 */ ,AA.REG_DT /* 장기집합투자_가입일자 */ ,AA.COM_CD /* 장기집합투자_금융회사등코드 */ ,AA.LONG_ASS_SUM /* 장기집합투자_연간합계액 */ ,AA.DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT /* 장기집합투자_소득공제대상금액 */ ,AA.CTR_TERM_MM_CNT FROM PDF_N101Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.DAT_CD IN ('G0029','G0043') AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY ) ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID )

INSERT INTO YE162040 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속년도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO /* 계좌번호_증권번호 */ ,TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD /* 국세청자료구분코드 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL /* 장기집합투자증권저축소득공제구분코드 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD /* 장기집합투자증권저축금융기관코드 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP /* 장기집합투자증권저축회사명 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT /* 장기집합투자증권저축납입금액 */ ,LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT /* 장기집합투자증권저축세액공제금액 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , 'Y0040110' , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167150 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO , SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , TRUNC((LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT * 0.40),0) AS LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , DAT_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162040 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162040 SET LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT = #ltrmCniSsIncDdcAmt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO=#ltrmCniSsAccno# AND DAT_CD = #datCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162040 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO , SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #ltrmCniSsAccno# , #systemkey# , #ltrmCniSsfnnCl# , #ltrmCniSsfnnOrgnCd# , #ltrmCniSsFnnCmp# , #ltrmCniSsPymAmt# , #ltrmCniSsIncDdcAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162040 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO=#ltrmCniSsAccno# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL=#ltrmCniSsfnnCl# , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD=#ltrmCniSsfnnOrgnCd# , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP=#ltrmCniSsFnnCmp# , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT=#ltrmCniSsPymAmt# , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT=#ltrmCniSsIncDdcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO=#ltrmCniSsAccno# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162040 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO=#ltrmCniSsAccno# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO , SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162040 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO=#ltrmCniSsAccno# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO , SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_CL , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162040 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162040 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
